participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Tech-averse and nostalgic, Jake enjoys country music and working on vintage cars. He is a proud dog owner and a single dad who values deep connections.
participant_1.background: My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. I prefer being inside. I'm a 46-year-old single dad with kids. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Social and lively, Maya loves spending time at the gym and indulging in her passion for cars. She's light-hearted, though her relationship history is sparse.
participant_2.background: I watch too much TV in my spare time. I go to the gym most days just to socialize. I've never had a steady relationship. I work from home. I like to spend my money on cars.
